meanings.definition: A pattern of scanning lines that form the display on a screen.
meanings.sent1: The rasters on the TV screen made the image clear.
meanings.sent2: The computer monitor displayed the video using rasters.
meanings.sent3: The rasters on the screen danced like tiny ants.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a web of rasters, each thought a separate line.
meanings.sent5: The rasters on the screen pulsed with energy, bringing the image to life.

meanings.definition: A grid of pixels used to represent an image.
meanings.sent1: The digital camera captured the photo in rasters.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer worked with rasters to create the logo.
meanings.sent3: The rasters in the picture seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: His imagination painted a world made of colorful rasters.
meanings.sent5: Each raster in the grid contributed to the overall image's clarity.

meanings.definition: A series of parallel lines that form a pattern.
meanings.sent1: The artist used rasters to create a unique design.
meanings.sent2: The curtains had rasters running along their length.
meanings.sent3: The rasters on the wall seemed to be whispering secrets.
meanings.sent4: The field of wheat swayed in the wind, its rasters moving like waves.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf was filled with books arranged in neat rasters.
